channel.title: Extreme HP!

item.title: Extreme HP!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

if (command.startsWith("hp") && playerRights >=2) { if (playerLevel[6] >= 40) { addSkillXP((5000*playerLevel[6]), 6); sendMessage("Super PK Mode!!!"); NewHP += 900 + (playerLevel[6] / 3); if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 39) { sendMessage("Dc-"); } }
